title: President Donald J. Trump Will Promote Worldwide Economic Growth and Prosperity at the G20 Summit – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
June 27, 2019
So together, let us resolve to use our power, our resources, and our voices, not just for ourselves, but for our people — to lift their burdens, to raise their hopes, and to empower their dreams.
						President Donald J. Trump					GROWING THE WORLD ECONOMY: At the G20 Summit, President Donald J. Trump will encourage others to follow the United States’ pro-growth, pro-jobs, and pro-innovation example.ACHIEVING FAIR AND RECIPROCAL TRADE: President Trump is committed to promoting fair and reciprocal trade.ENCOURAGING INNOVATION: President Trump is committed to encouraging growth in the digital marketplace and supporting emerging technologies in order to promote future prosperity.PROMOTING ENERGY DEVELOPMENT: President Trump will use the G20 Summit to advance his “all-of-the-above” approach to energy development.EMPOWERING WOMEN AROUND THE GLOBE: President Trump understands that empowering women is smart economic and security policy.SUPPORTING SMART DEVELOPMENT WORLDWIDE: President Trump supports the use of transparent, accountable, and market-based financial development principles.
